sources.title: The Child Was a Serial Killer in a Past Life | Full Thriller Movie | Eric Roberts | The Child
sources.description:
The Child Was a Serial Killer in a Past Life | Full Thriller Movie | Eric Roberts | The Child

Simon Sachs, a terminally ill boy, claims to have been a serial killer in a previous life. To prove it, he leads defense lawyer, Robert Stern (Eric Roberts) to an abandoned industrial park. Sterns surprise turns into horror when he finds human remains of victims killed long before Simon was born. As Stern takes on the most compelling and mysterious case of his life, a deadly hunt begins 

2012. Stars: Eric Roberts, Dieter Landuris, Ben Becker
*Licensed from Palm Tree. All rights reserved*

metadata.Plot: A man was told he has had 101 past lives. This short film tells of a few of them. The last story leads him on a very emotional trip to a past life.
